short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Darling In The Franxx wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Darling In The Franxx background. Darling In The Franxx theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Darling In The Franxx wallpapers each time a new tab is opened.
2. Customize your Darling In The Franxx background through the wallpaper selection panel or set it as a favorite.
3. Integrated Google Search bar.
4. Convenient links to email and social media platforms.
5. Display the current date and time automatically.
6. Create notes to keep track of your tasks.
7. Quickly visit your most frequently accessed websites.
8. Simple access to your bookmarks.
9. Easily add websites to the Shortcut panel for faster access.
10. Direct links to Google applications.
11. Instant access to additional themes.
12. Streamlined sharing to social networks.
13. Download wallpapers with just a click.
14. Quick access to games.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Darling In The Franxx new tab.
